titles.title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Nevada except by express authorization of Congress.
To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Nevada except by express authorization of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Nevada from being undertaken, except by express authorization of Congress.
